body: Yandere Chan takes over Avicus... They were having a battle. Which one wins?
body_tagged: Yandere Chan takes over Avicus... They were having a battle. Which one wins?
title: Avicus vs Yandere Simulator

replies.body: I had to Google this... from my brief wiki reading this seems like this is about some anime thing where a girl gets stalked? So in that case I'm going to pick Avicus...?
replies.body_tagged: I had to Google this... from my brief wiki reading this seems like this is about some anime thing where a girl gets stalked? So in that case I'm going to pick Avicus...?

replies.body:
It's a game where you play as a yandere character, who basically murders people in her school for her senpai.

As Avicus is not an actual person, Yandere Chan would win in a battle... Because she could just destroy the computer.
